title: Spikey Booshes Merch
description: After lots of requests from our community we finally made it! SPIKEY BOOSHES merch. Well sort of, we explain more about it in update #118 . In short we don't like the idea of shipping t-shirts around the world since it has a large environmental impact. (even though it would be a good source of income) We believe there are other creative/less wasteful ways to achieve this. Have a look at fixing.fashion for more information about the issues with the fashion industry and what to do about it. For now we've made an spikey bushes illustration and added a bunch of different files that you can use to stitch, carve, press. Download the package below for free. Share what you made with it on #spikeybooshes
